column3: Code review ACK ae9b48995bff505ea2b771313cac65d9acf6f29e\nThe ARM failure seems unrelated.

Code Review ACK ae9b48995bff505ea2b771313cac65d9acf6f29e\n\nCurrently this doesn't run in Guix containers due to the debian-specific `--no-*` flags. Will patch our binutils in Guix to enable these flags.

> Currently this doesn't run in Guix containers due to the debian-specific --no-* flags. \n\nWorth noting that these flags are unavailable in Ubuntu 20.04LTS, as the [`binutils-mingw-w64-x86-64`](https://packages.ubuntu.com/focal/binutils-mingw-w64-x86-64) package is version 8.8, and the [commit to restore the `--no-*` flags](https://salsa.debian.org/mingw-w64-team/binutils-mingw-w64/-/commit/6d
